title: 2/bd 2/ba, Resident social lounge, Henderson NV
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Oversized walk-in closets-Ceiling fans in dining room-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring-Two-tone paint scheme Select units-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Polished kitchen countertops-Exterior storage available

Onsite playground-Fenced dog park with pet watering station-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area-Resident social lounge-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Controlled-entry access-Professional onsite management-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
